Author: Rcki
Name: Loop Emote
Description:
Ever wanted emotes like /read to loop forever? Have you tried using Auto Hotkey scripts or something similar to achieve that result by repeatedly entering the /command with a specified interval?
Well, now you can do all that with this plugin without all the jank that comes with AHK scripts and ACTUALLY opening your chat to type it in!

Commands:
/lemote config - Opens the config page.
/lemote <emote command> [loop interval in ms] [extra tags] - Starts looping the specified emote with the specified interval (if interval is not specified, uses the default loop interval that you can set in the config)
/lemote stop - Stops the current loop

Extra Tags:
'move' - movement no longer interrupts the loop

Examples:
'/lemote read 11000' causes the 'read' emote to loop with an interval of 11000 ms
'/lemote reflect 6000 move' causes the 'reflect' emote to loop with an interval of 6000 ms AND allows movement without interrupting the loop
